weka.server

Class JSONProtocol

  • java.lang.Object
    • weka.server.JSONProtocol

  • public class JSONProtocol
extends java.lang.Object
    Routines for encoding/decoding data to/from JSON
    Version:
    $Revision: $
    Author:
    Mark Hall (mhall{[at]}pentaho{[dot]}com)

      • addPayloadMap

        public static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> addPayloadMap(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> responseMap,
                                                                             java.lang.String payloadTypeIdentifier)
        Creates and adds a payload map to the supplied response map. Overwrites any existing payload map in the supplied response
        Parameters:
        responseMap - the response map to add payload to
        payloadTypeIdentifier - the type of payload (added to the payload map under the PAYLOAD_TYPE_KEY)
        Returns:
        the payload map that was added

      • addPayloadMap

        public static void addPayloadMap(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> responseMap,
                                 java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> payloadMap,
                                 java.lang.String payloadIdentifier)
        Adds a supplied payload map to the supplied response map. Overwrites any existing payload map.
        Parameters:
        responseMap - the response map to add the payload to
        payloadMap - the payload map to add
        payloadIdentifier - the type of payload (added to the payload map under the PAYLOAD_TYPE_KEY)
